pages.text: To make it harder for games to break, ships are unbreakable in survival. To remove a ship, $(thing)Right Click the ship with any Pickaxe/$. The ship will be returned to your inventory unless it was sitting on top of a board tile, in which case the ship will also automatically deregister itself from the controller the board belongs to.

$(l)Please do not break ships during games in creative mode/$. There's nothing I can do to prevent it, but doing so will guarantee that you'll run into problems. You should also read $(l:naval_warfare:misc/seaworthy_limitations)Seaworthy Limitations/$ if the ship you want to remove has the $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)Seaworhty/$ passive ability.
